scripts.bundle:ios: npx react-native bundle --platform ios --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output output/main.jsbundle --assets-dest output/assets
scripts.bundle:android: npx react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output output/index.android.bundle --assets-dest output/assets
scripts.bundle:all: npm run bundle:ios && npm run bundle:android
scripts.export:android: mkdir -p output/android && npx react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output output/android/index.android.bundle --assets-dest output/android && cd output && zip -r index.android.bundle.zip android && mv index.android.bundle.zip .. && cd .. && rm -rf output
scripts.export:ios: mkdir -p output/ios && npx react-native bundle --platform ios --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output output/ios/main.jsbundle --assets-dest output/ios && cd output && zip -r main.jsbundle.zip ios && mv main.jsbundle.zip .. && cd .. && rm -rf output
scripts.export:all: npm run export:android && npm run export:ios
